title: Ramadan Is Here
description: Ramadan is a month-long Muslim holiday highlighted by daytime fasting. In Ramadan Is Here students will follow a girl and her family as they celebrate this holiday together. The book uses detailed, colorful illustrations and repetitive sentence patterns to support the reader. The book can also be used to teach students how to identify story elements as well as how to ask and answer questions.
